aria-label.description: Human readable label for the dialog, in event the dialog title is not rendered

closeOnEsc.description: Whether to close the dialog when the escape key is pressed

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether to close the dialog when the outside is clicked

finalFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the dialog is closed

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  trigger: string
  container: string
  backdrop: string
  content: string
  closeTrigger: string
  title: string
  description: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the dialog. Useful for composition.

initialFocusEl.description: Element to receive focus when the dialog is opened

modal.description: Whether to prevent pointer interaction outside the element and hide all content below it

onClose.description: Callback to be invoked when the dialog is closed

onEsc.description: Callback to be invoked when the escape key is pressed

onOpen.description: Callback to be invoked when the dialog is opened

onOutsideClick.description: Callback to be invoked when the outside is clicked

preventScroll.description: Whether to prevent scrolling behind the dialog when it's opened

restoreFocus.description: Whether to restore focus to the element that had focus before the dialog was opened

trapFocus.description: Whether to trap focus inside the dialog when it's opened
